alert.note: Alert for Glades; Hendry; Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 4:11PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Hendry, northwestern Palm Beach and southeastern Glades Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 411 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a funnel cloud along a line extending from near Clewiston to near Okeelanta. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds, winds in excess of 40 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Belle Glade, Clewiston, Pahokee, South Bay, Canal Point, Lake Harbor, Okeelanta, Belle Glade Camp, Lion Country Safari Park, Fremd Village-Padgett Island and Harlem. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Persons participating in outdoor activities should seek sturdy shelter until these storms pass. Open shelters found in parks, beaches, or golf courses offer no protection from the dangers of lightning.

area.areaDesc: Glades; Hendry; Inland Palm Beach County
